item.title: AWS
item.description: Setup # Install awscli sudo apt install awscli # Set config aws configure AWS Access Key ID [None]: test AWS Secret Access Key [None]: test Default region name [None]: test Default output format [None]: Default AWS Credential Location ~/.aws/credentials AWS Services S3 dynamodb lambda # List buckets aws s3 --endpoint-url <TARGET> ls # List bucket aws s3 --endpoint-url <TARGET> ls s3://<BUCKET_NAME> # Upload to bucket aws s3 --endpoint-url <TARGET> cp <FILE> s3://<BUCKET_NAME>/<FILE> # List tables aws --endpoint-url <TARGET> dynamodb list-tables # Dump table aws --endpoint-url <TARGET> dynamodb scan --table-name <TABLE_NAME> # Create table (e.
